rationale: The segment contains 'fully human pathogen' but 'human pathogen' is a noun phrase, not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: So far, the virus hasn't made the changes that would enable it to become a fully human pathogen, said Dr. Michael Osterholm, who directs the Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy at the University of Minnesota. So far, the virus hasn't made the changes that would enable it to become a fully human pathogen, said Dr. Michael Osterholm, who directs the Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy at the University of Minnesota. It's [It becoming a fully human pathogen] unclear whether it [it becoming a fully human pathogen] ever will.
